content:
(Gasp!) You're not... going to build a car, are you?!

With such a tiny workbench?

Did you see the crafting table Mobai set up for you?

I'm curious to see what you'll make~

Tools? Furniture? Or perhaps...

I don't want my friends to worry, so I don't intend to tell them.
I'm just... running out of energy.
I just want to lie down on the sofa and stare at the starry sky in silence.

I polished the lenses for my stargazing telescope myself,
Even though it would've been easier to follow existing blueprints,

But for those who use them,
customizing your own tools is also a form of devotion.
When I don't feel like socializing, I'll pretend that I'm home sick and hide in my room.
